mapper.select: select id, sn, name, area_id, address, longitude, latitude, product_key, device_name, device_secret, usable_status, power_status, online_status, model_id, version, fully_charged, service_phone, business_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag from electricity.t_electricity_cabinet where del_flag=0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into electricity.t_electricity_cabinet(sn, name, area_id, address, longitude, latitude, product_key, device_name, device_secret, usable_status, power_status, online_status, model_id, version, fully_charged, service_phone, business_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values (#{sn}, #{name}, #{areaId}, #{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{productKey}, #{deviceName}, #{deviceSecret}, #{usableStatus}, #{powerStatus}, #{onlineStatus}, #{modelId}, #{version}, #{fullyCharged}, #{servicePhone}, #{businessTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_electricity_cabinet
sn = #{sn},
name = #{name},
area_id = #{areaId},
address = #{address},
longitude = #{longitude},
latitude = #{latitude},
product_key = #{productKey},
device_name = #{deviceName},
device_secret = #{deviceSecret},
usable_status = #{usableStatus},
power_status = #{powerStatus},
online_status = #{onlineStatus},
model_id = #{modelId},
version = #{version},
fully_charged = #{fullyCharged},
service_phone = #{servicePhone},
business_time = #{businessTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
